summary: Documented WezTerm tab integration across three locations: dotfiles (terminal.md), Neovim config (README.md + lib/README.md), and ProofChecker hooks context file. Covers OSC 7 directory updates, task number display, notification coloring, and shell hook/Neovim autocmd interaction.

completion_data.completion_summary: Documented WezTerm tab integration for Claude Code across dotfiles, Neovim, and ProofChecker with cross-references between all locations. Created 4 documentation artifacts covering OSC escape sequences, user variables, and notification behavior.

next_steps: Review documentation and verify cross-references are accessible
